attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of tax credits system it has created a whole army of people who are now in debt to the treasury. Retrospective benefits based on last years income are a guaranteed recipe to ensure that people will be in debt and create a dependancy culture. Married man's tax allowance was paid to everybody it never caused these problems. The Chancellor should publicly apologise for the disaster that he created.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
